remediation-run
***************


Description
===========

A remediation run represents an execution of a Remediation Recipe to
detect and fix vulnerabilities based on current state of the
Vulnerabilities curated in the Knowledge Base. A Run can be triggered
manually or when a new CVE is discovered.


Available Commands
==================

* cancel

* change-compartment

* create

* delete

* get

* list

* list-application-dependency-recommendations

* update
